QuestData.Title: Tastes Like Strider
QuestData.Description: You there! Yes, you! You want a good word put in with the Trade Baron? Give me a hand!$B$BI heard you're the one that got all those makrura tails. They're wonderful, but not enough for proper swamp food. I need drumsticks for my gumbo!$B$BThere's plenty of swampstriders just outside town in the Sorrowmurk. I want the biggest drumsticks you can find!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 9 Jumbo Swampstrider Drumsticks from Swampstriders.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, good, good! Just what I needed.
